purpose: Verify that pulsed operation stays within the device safe operating area (SOA).
scope: Applies to DUTs in pulsed load applications.
setup: Configure programmable load or pulse generator to apply controlled current pulses while monitoring VDS and IDS.
procedure:
1. Set up pulse generator per application conditions.
2. Apply pulses at specified duty cycle and frequency.
3. Monitor VDS and IDS during pulses.
4. Compare against published SOA curves.
measurement: Measure peak VDS and IDS for each pulse condition.
acceptancecriteria: All operating points must remain within derated SOA with margin.

measurement_settings.other_settings: Duty cycle and pulse width per spec.

example_data.description: Pulse waveform with VDS and IDS.
